{"rule":"COMMA_PARENTHESIS_WHITESPACE","sentence":"^\\Q</head> <body> <div id=\"textField\" class=\"editor\"></div> </body> <script> let textField = document.getElementById('textField') textField.contentEditable = true; textField.spellcheck = false; // 在textField的所有子元素div被backspace删除后，模拟用户输入了回车 textField.addEventListener(\"keyup\", (e)=>{ if(true){ let divs = textField.querySelectorAll(\"div\"); if(divs.length == 0){ // e.preventDefault(); // e.stopPropagation(); textField.innerHTML = \"<div></div>\"; } } }); textField.focus() </script>\\E$"}

{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\Q</head> <body> <div id=\"textField\" class=\"editor\"></div> </body> <script> let textField = document.getElementById('textField') textField.contentEditable = true; textField.spellcheck = false; // 在textField的所有子元素div被backspace删除后，模拟用户输入了回车 textField.addEventListener(\"keyup\", (e) => { if(true){ let divs = textField.querySelectorAll(\"div\"); if(divs.length == 0){ // e.preventDefault(); // e.stopPropagation(); textField.innerHTML = \"<div></div>\"; } } }); textField.focus() </script>\\E$"}
